data.title: Buy Samsung Galaxy S6 G920V/S6 Edge G925F 5.1 Inch 3GB+32GB Octa Core LTE NFC Refurbished Mobile Phone
data.meta_description: Key Features Display: 5.1 inches 1440 x 2560 pixels resolution, capacitive touchscreen. CPU: Octa-core (4x2.1 GHz Cortex-A57 & 4x1.5 GHz Cortex-A53). GPU: Mali-T760MP8. RAM + ROM: 3GB RAM + 32GB ROM. Rear camera: 16 MP, f/1.9, 28mm, 1/2.6", 1.12µm, OIS, AF; Front camera: 5 MP, f/1.9, 22mm, 1/4.1", 1.34µm. Bluetooth: 4.1. SIM: Nano-SIM.
data.text:
Description

Attention to this point :

1.G920F is Straight screen (Galaxy S6 version)

2.G925F is Curved screen (Galaxy S6 Edge version)

NETWORK

Technology: GSM / HSPA / LTE

2G bands: GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900

3G bands: HSDPA 850 / 900 / 1900 / 2100

4G

bands: LTE band 1(2100), 2(1900), 3(1800), 4(1700/2100), 5(850),

7(2600), 8(900), 12(700), 17(700), 18(800), 19(800), 20(800), 26(850)

Speed: HSPA 42.2/5.76 Mbps, LTE-A Cat6 300/50 Mbps

GPRS: Yes

EDGE: Yes

BODY

Dimensions: 143.4 x 70.5 x 6.8 mm (5.65 x 2.78 x 0.27 in)

Weight: 138 g (4.87 oz)

Build: Front/back glass (Gorilla Glass 4), aluminum frame

SIM: Nano-SIM

– Samsung Pay (Visa, MasterCard certified)

DISPLAY

Type: Super AMOLED capacitive touchscreen, 16M colors

Size: 5.1 inches, 71.5 cm2 (~70.7% screen-to-body ratio)

Resolution: 1440 x 2560 pixels, 16:9 ratio (~577 ppi density)

Multitouch: Yes

Protection: Corning Gorilla Glass 4

– TouchWiz UI

PLATFORM

OS: Android 5.0.2 (Lollipop), 7.0 (Nougat), planned upgrade to Android 8.0 (Oreo)

Chipset: Exynos 7420 Octa

CPU: Octa-core (4×2.1 GHz Cortex-A57 & 4×1.5 GHz Cortex-A53)

GPU: Mali-T760MP8

MEMORY

Card slot: No

Internal: 32/64/128 GB, 3 GB RAM

MAIN CAMERA

Single: 16 MP, f/1.9, 28mm, 1/2.6″, 1.12µm, OIS, AF

Features: LED flash, auto-HDR, panorama

Video: [email protected], [email protected], [email protected], HDR, dual-video rec.

SELFIE CAMERA

Single: 5 MP, f/1.9, 22mm, 1/4.1″, 1.34µm

Features: Dual video call, Auto-HDR

Video: [email protected]

SOUND

Alert types: Vibration; MP3, WAV ringtones

Loudspeaker: Yes

3.5mm jack: Yes

– 24-bit/192kHz audio

– Active noise cancellation with dedicated mic

COMMS

WLAN: Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, dual-band, Wi-Fi Direct, hotspot

Bluetooth: 4.1, A2DP, LE, aptX

GPS: Yes, with A-GPS, GLONASS, BDS

NFC: Yes

Infrared port: Yes

Radio: No

USB: microUSB 2.0, USB Host

FEATURES

Sensors: Fingerprint (front-mounted), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass, barometer, heart rate, SpO2

Messaging: SMS(threaded view), MMS, Email, Push Email, IM

Browser: HTML5

– Qi/PMA wireless charging (market dependent)

– ANT+ support

– S-Voice natural language commands and dictation

– OneDrive (115 GB cloud storage)

– MP4/DivX/XviD/WMV/H.264 player

– MP3/WAV/WMA/eAAC+/FLAC player

– Photo/video editor

– Document editor

BATTERY

Battery: Non-removable Li-Ion 2550 mAh battery
